means: 拖延，延缓，推迟( defer的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Recently, the Supreme Court has focused on an additional reason for deferring to administrative agencies.
sentence.Network_cn: 最近, 最高法院强调了尊重行政机构的另一种理由.

sentence.Network_en: Think of it as deferring part of the compiler's job to runtime.
sentence.Network_cn: 可以认为这是将编译器的部分工作延迟到了运行时.

sentence.Network_en: Cannot process at interrupt level. Deferring request to system task level.
sentence.Network_cn: 无法在中断级进行处理. 将请求延缓给系统任务级.

PerfectNetExp.abs: small businesses would also be helped deferring the increase in corporation tax from 21 % to 22 % .小企业也将得到帮助，政府将延迟从21％到22％的公司税上调征收时间。

although conventional wisdom says to minimize the number of HTTP requests , deferring scripts whenever possible allows the page to render more quickly , providing users with a better overall experience .传统的智慧告诉我们应尽量减少HTTP请求的数量，尽量延迟加载脚本以使页面渲染速度更快，向用户提供更好的整
deferredtaxes 递延税款, deferring 决定子, deferrer 缓期学生

entry.def: If you defer an event or action, you arrange for it to happen at a later date, rather than immediately or at the previously planned time.

example.ex: Customers often defer payment for as long as possible...
example.tran: 顾客常常会尽可能地拖延付款。

example.ex: I'm not going to defer decisions just because they are not immediately politically popular.
example.tran: 我不会因为它们没有即刻在政治上受到欢迎就推迟作出这些决定。

entry.def: If you defer to someone, you accept their opinion or do what they want you to do, even when you do not agree with it yourself, because you respect them or their authority.

example.ex: Doctors are encouraged to defer to experts.
example.tran: 鼓励医生听从专家的意见。

auth_sentence.content: Deferring their charging is only one side of the deal.
auth_sentence.res_content: Deferring their charging is only one side of the deal.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Deferring their charging is only one side of the deal.

auth_sentence.content: One idea is that they stop deferring to other males in the presence of the alpha male to ensure he does not become aggressive.
auth_sentence.res_content: One idea is that they stop deferring to other males in the presence of the alpha male to ensure he does not become aggressive.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One idea is that they stop deferring to other males in the presence of the alpha male to ensure he does not become aggressive.

auth_sentence.content: We're not solving any environmental problems with fission, we're merely deferring it.
auth_sentence.res_content: We're not solving any environmental problems with fission, we're merely deferring it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We're not solving any environmental problems with fission, we're merely deferring it.
